Posts.Content: Hello Cubsfan I hope your surgery goes well. Mine was yesterday and all went well. Just need to wait for the pathology results. Make sure you take care of yourself and listen to the Doctor's instructions. Please let us know how things went. Ingrid
Posts.Title: Wish me well

Posts.Content: Good luck with your surgery and hope all goes well. I will be thinking of you in the recovery room as my surgery is the day before.
